summary: The Dome of the Rock is an important Islamic shrine in Jerusalem, built in 691-692 CE by the Umayyad Caliphate. It's the oldest surviving Islamic architecture and has inscriptions that mention Islam and Prophet Muhammad. The dome collapsed in 1015 and was rebuilt later. Its design was inspired by Byzantine churches. The site is significant to Abrahamic religions, believed to be where God created the world and where Prophet Abraham tried to sacrifice his son. It's a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a famous Jerusalem landmark.
title: Dome of the Rock
